snippet: For David Stark, an event designer who helps plan parties including the Whitney Museum Gala, a typical Sunday includes time with his husband, a trip to a museum and a nap.
abstract: David Stark, event designer who is planning Whitney Museum Gala, describes his typical Sunday routine.
lead_paragraph: For David Stark, an event designer who helps plan parties including the Whitney Museum Gala, a typical Sunday includes time with his husband, a trip to a museum and a nap.

headline.seo: What It Takes to Make the Whitney Museum Gala Happen
